document_data.name: Yalaj
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yalaj''' were a family of [[Kuong_Kingdom#Society|jinyan]] ([[yakuza]] in other lands) based in the town of [[Denokanburi]] in the [[Kuong Kingdom]].
document_data.Activities: In the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Yalaj dominated river port town and were engaged in smuggling and protection rackets.
